name: Roscosmas Landing
description:
A new spaceship, open space and a bunch of drunk cosmonauts decided to ruin your working day, but the benefit is that you are the boss here and you can safely take more and more ships, even if they are broken, because the goal is noble-to find and save drunk cosmonauts in spiritless space, and if this does not frighten you, then on earth you are waiting for corrupt officials who urgently need to be evacuated!

Roscosmas Landing is a Space arcade game where you control a spaceship, Dodge unusual shaped soils, pick up drifting astronauts or dirty corrupt officials before they are caught by your superiors, and try to land the ship as soon as possible before your fuel runs out.

Feature of game:
- Complexity
- Beautiful Pixel-Art
- Convenient control
- Humor
- Achievement statistics
